ks.common.model
Class Column

java.lang.Object
  ks.common.model.Element
      ks.common.model.Stack
          ks.common.model.Column

public class Column
extends Stack

Representation of a stack of cards that will appear either vertically or horizontally placed on the screen, slightly overlapping each other.

Creation date: (9/30/01 10:51:34 PM)

Author:
George T. Heineman (heineman@cs.wpi.edu)
